name: Upper Body
description: Upper body strength and hypertrophy workouts.

workout_groups.name: Beginner Upper Body Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: A foundational routine to build upper body strength and stability.

workouts.name: Push-Ups
workouts.description: Perform slow and controlled push-ups with full range of motion.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
workouts.description: Press dumbbells overhead while keeping a controlled motion.

workouts.name: Lat Pulldown
workouts.description: Engage the lats and pull the bar down with control.

workouts.name: Seated Row
workouts.description: Strengthen the upper back by pulling the handle toward your torso.

workouts.name: Bicep Curls
workouts.description: Perform controlled curls to develop arm strength.

workout_groups.name: Upper Body Strength & Hypertrophy Routine
workout_groups.description: A routine designed to build muscle and strength in the chest, shoulders, and arms.

workouts.name: Bench Press
workouts.description: Lift moderate-to-heavy weight with controlled tempo.

workouts.name: Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Perform strict pull-ups focusing on lat activation.

workouts.name: Dumbbell Arnold Press
workouts.description: Rotate the dumbbells through the press for full shoulder engagement.

workouts.name: Face Pulls
workouts.description: Use a cable or resistance band to strengthen the rear delts and traps.

workouts.name: Incline Dumbbell Curls
workouts.description: Focus on full range of motion to maximize bicep activation.

workout_groups.name: Explosive Upper Body Power Routine
workout_groups.description: A workout focusing on speed, explosiveness, and fast-twitch muscle activation.

workouts.name: Speed Bench Press
workouts.description: Press the bar with explosive force from the chest.

workouts.name: Medicine Ball Slams
workouts.description: Slam a medicine ball into the ground as fast as possible.

workouts.name: Clap Push-Ups
workouts.description: Perform push-ups with an explosive clap at the top.

workouts.name: Seated Explosive Shoulder Press
workouts.description: Press dumbbells overhead as quickly as possible with controlled form.

workouts.name: Kettlebell Swings
workouts.description: Use an explosive hip drive to swing the kettlebell overhead.

workout_groups.name: Functional Upper Body Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: A workout designed to improve real-world upper body strength and mobility.

workouts.name: Farmerâ€™s Carry
workouts.description: Walk with heavy dumbbells or kettlebells while maintaining posture.

workouts.name: Rope Climbs
workouts.description: Climb a rope using only upper body strength.

workouts.name: Landmine Press
workouts.description: Press a landmine barbell in a controlled manner to engage shoulders and core.

workouts.name: Parallel Bar Dips
workouts.description: Perform controlled dips to target chest and triceps.

workouts.name: One-Arm Dumbbell Snatch
workouts.description: Lift a dumbbell explosively from the ground to overhead in one motion.

workout_groups.name: Super Upper Body Strength Routine
workout_groups.description: An advanced routine focused on achieving elite-level upper body strength.

workouts.name: Weighted Pull-Ups
workouts.description: Perform strict pull-ups with added weight.

workouts.name: One-Arm Push-Ups
workouts.description: Perform push-ups on one arm while maintaining core stability.
